attributes.action: Initiate a temporary circuit-breaker lockdown to get cases down for winter
attributes.additional_details: This temporary lockdown would bide some time to sort out the test and trace system which is far from working effectively. There have been too many deaths in the UK compared to other countries in Europe. The restrictions currently in place are simply not enough.
attributes.background: SAGE have advised a circuit breaker lockdown would help to get COVID-19 cases down this winter in order to help the NHS and save lives. With flu season upon us it appears that the health service could become overwhelmed and more people will die as a result.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new national lockdown, from 5 November to 2 December: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/new-national-restrictions-from-5-november

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enforce an extreme two-week lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553156

Start a second lockdown including closing schools to prevent spread of COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550736
